text: Avaru nadesuttiruva heccina gupta samalocanegalalli hitavenu illa â€“ dana dharmavannu adesisuva, olitannu bodhisuva athava janara naduve sandhana erpadisalikkagi nadesuva samalocanegala horatu. Allahana meccugeyannu sampadisalikkagi i karyavannu (samalocanegalannu) nadesuvavarige navu sighradalle bhari pratiphala nidaliddeve
